text: Ezɨ Atrivim Devit Joap ko mɨdorozir gumazibar gumazir dapanir igharazir mabav gɨa ghaze, “Ia mangɨ Israelian gumazamiziba bar me mengegh. Ia kantrin danganiba bar adar mangɨ, notɨn amadaghan Danɨn nguibar ekiam ikegh, mangɨ sautɨn amadaghan Berseban nguibar ekiamɨn otogh, gumazamiziba bar me mengegh. Kɨ e uan gumazamizibar dɨbobonim gɨfoghasa.”
